description: Changes the list of users that belong to the Access Control List.

parameters.name: ACLName
parameters.description: The name of the Access Control List.

parameters.name: UserNamesToAdd
parameters.description: The list of users to add to the Access Control List. (string) ---

parameters.name: UserNamesToRemove
parameters.description: The list of users to remove from the Access Control List. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the Access Control List.

nested_items.name: UserNames
nested_items.description: The list of user names that belong to the ACL.

nested_items.name: MinimumEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The minimum engine version supported for the ACL.

nested_items.name: PendingChanges
nested_items.description: A list of updates being applied to the ACL.

nested_items.name: UserNamesToRemove
nested_items.description: A list of user names being removed from the ACL.

nested_items.name: UserNamesToAdd
nested_items.description: A list of users being added to the ACL.

nested_items.name: Clusters
nested_items.description: A list of clusters associated with the ACL.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ACL.
